title: WebShooter
extendedDescription: A high-performance archiving utility designed for Unix-like systems that leverages multi-threading to optimize operations. Developed as part of my Computer Science final project, this tool significantly outperforms traditional archivers like tar and cpio through parallel processing.

features.name: Parallel Archiving
features.description: Multi-threaded archiving using producer-consumer pattern for maximum performance.

features.name: CLI & Library
features.description: Dual-mode operation offering both CLI utility and embeddable C library.

features.name: Structure Preservation
features.description: Maintains complete directory hierarchy and file metadata.
